How many people are affected by Denys-Drash syndrome ?,The prevalence of Denys-Drash syndrome is unknown; at least 150 affected individuals have been reported in the scientific literature.,GHR,Denys-Drash syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to Denys-Drash syndrome ?,"Mutations in the WT1 gene cause Denys-Drash syndrome. The WT1 gene provides instructions for making a protein that regulates the activity of other genes by attaching (binding) to spe
